article.title: Search for a scalar partner of the top quark in the jets plus missing transverse momentum final state at $\sqrt s$=13 TeV with the ATLAS detector

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of these decay topologies is NOT considered in this search for top-squark pair production?
What is the dominant Standard Model background process in the kinematic region targeted by the m<sub>0,jet,R=1.2</sub> discriminating variable?
choices: Z → νν¯ produced in association with heavy-flavour jets

multiple_choice_question.text: What do the black lines in Figure 3 represent?
choices: The mass of the W boson and the top quark
The separation in ΔR between the two reclustered jets
The requirement on the reclustered jet masses used to define the categories
The efficiency of reconstructing top-quark candidates in each category

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of these selection criteria is NOT applied in the TW category for signal region A?
